column1:
Overall, the Cleaniness sentiment has stayed relatively consistent over the years, with a slight increase from 32% in 2017 to 38% in 2023. Amenities sentiment has seen a large uptick from 50.6% in 2016 to 54.7% in 2023. Location sentiment has increased from 38.4% in 2017 to 40.7% in 2019 before trending back downward slightly. Services sentiment has increased from 43.4% in 2017 to 42.8% in 2019 before trending downward again. General sentiment has fluctuated ranging from 42.7% in 2017 to 45.4% in 2018, but trending downward. Value sentiment has had a slight downward trend ranging from 46.0% in 2016 to 35.5% in 2022.

Suggestions for improving Cleaniness sentiment would include increasing the frequency of scheduled cleanings and ensuring that all parts of the business premises are consistently kept up. Amenities sentiment could be improved by offering additional amenities such as complimentary food or beverages, or by maximizing the usage of existing amenities. Location sentiment can be improved by providing more convenient transportation options to the business or making the premises easier to access. Services sentiment could be raised through offering more services such as booking systems or discounts. General sentiment could be increased by ensuring customer service is consistently of a high standard. Finally, Value sentiment could be improved by reinvesting profits back into the business to improve quality or to offer discounts or deals.
